name: NSCustomImageRep
desc: An object that uses a delegate object to render an image from a custom format.

items.name: init(draw: Selector, delegate: Any)
items.desc: Returns a representation of an image initialized with the specified delegate information.

items.name: init(size: NSSize, flipped: Bool, drawingHandler: (NSRect) -> Bool)
items.desc: Initializes a representation of an image of the specified size and flipped status, using a block to draw its content.

items.name: var drawingHandler: ((NSRect) -> Bool)?
items.desc: The destination rectangle of the drawing handler block.

items.name: var delegate: AnyObject?
items.desc: The delegate object that renders the image for the image representation.

items.name: var drawSelector: Selector?
items.desc: The selector for the delegate's drawing method.
